venue.name: David Rockefeller Center for Latin Studies

item.description:
Hola compañeros!

Vengan a disfrutar una pelicula en Español. Vean abajo para mas informacion. Toma nota que esta pelicula no tiene subtitulos en Ingles (NO ENGLISH SUBTITLES), asi que vengan preparad@s para eso.

Animense!

SUNDAY, DECEMBER 5
David Rockefeller Center for Latin American Studies at Harvard
1730 Cambridge Street, Cambridge
CGIS S-010/Tsai Auditorium
$8 adults
$5 child/ senior

2.00 p.m.
La Anunciacion (NO ENGLISH SUBTITLES)
100 minutes / Cuba
Trailer: http://www.youtube.co...

Pineda Barnet is the multiple award-winning director of La Bella del
Alhambra, (Oscar nominated, and one of the most important Cuban films of
recent years). His latest feature, set in Havana , is an overwhelmingly
powerful evocation of a Cuban family�s tumultuous history, centring around
the reading of a will by widowed, spiritualist matriarch Amalia. It is a
brilliant and visceral cinematic study of inter-generational turmoil as
the family members fall victim to the tyranny of memory, tortured by the
turmoil which marked their past lives.

More information and a full schedule go to http://bliff.org/sche...

Gracias!
item.how_to_find_us: "Karin y otros companeros de meetup estaran alli trabajando de voluntarios. Puden buscarlos en el sotano de DRCLAS afuera del auditorio."

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Pelicula Cubana en Cambridge - La Anunciacion
